summary: Realism ENB preset. And the day when it rains get wet.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffe599][size=5]News
[/size][/color][size=4]27/Jan/2018 Release the Universe ENB VI revision4 It corresponds and fix to ENBseries v0.319. [url=http://radland.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-27.html]MY BLOG[/url]
25/Oct/2017 Release the Universe ENB VI revision3. It corresponds to ENBseries v0.318. [url=http://radland.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-26.html]MY BLOG[/url]
25/Jul/2017  Release the Universe ENB VI revision2. It corresponds to ENBseries v0.315.
26/Jun/2017 Release the Universe ENB VI revision.
13/May/2017 Release the Universe ENB VI. [url=http://radland.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-3.html]
[/url]
[/size]
                             [youtube]5zgxvaZ753w[/youtube]

[size=6]Installation[/size]
[size=4]
[color=#ffd966]1)Set Game[/color]
[/size][size=3]Open SkyrimPrefs.ini 
. bTreesReceiveShadows=1 
. bDrawLandShadows=1 
. bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
Start up Skyrim Lancher,open Skyrim options.
Turn off antialiasing and anisotropic filtering.[/size]
[size=4]


[color=#ffd966]2)Open Main files[/color]
[/size][size=3]Install u_enb_weather.zip in NMM or Mod Organizer, Enable u_enb_weather.esp (If there is DLC or Legandary Edition, Enable "u_enb_weather_dlc1.esp" and "u_enb_weather_dlc3.esp") 
Copy enbseries folder,enblocal.ini and enbseries.ini  Peast to Skyrim install folder.(Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim)

  *Attention,to make them apply this plug-in right. 
   one,Stand by for 24 hours indoors.   
   or You make data of Clean save, and install.   
   or After installing, it start new game.[/size]

[color=#ff7700]! Sorry,[/color][color=#ff7700] There is a one correction ![/color]
[color=#ff7700]Actually, " u_enb_weather_dlc2.esp " is " DLC3 Dragonborn "[/color]
10/Jun, I made modifications by update. ( "[color=#ff7700] u_enb_weather_dlc3 [/color]" )





[size=4][color=#ffd966]3)Download[/color] [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENBseries[/url] [/size] 
[size=3] Get to enbseries_skyrim_v03xx_zip ( or latest version. )  
Open the WrapperVersion folder and copy d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe  
Paste d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe to your Skyrim install folder.(Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim)[/size]




[size=4][color=#ffd966]4)ENB patch[/color]
[/size][size=3]Download [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499]PARTICLE PATCH ALL-IN-ONE[/url] and install PARTICLE PATCH ALL-IN-ONE in NMM etc..
[/size]



[color=#ffd966][size=4]Option files [/size] [/color]
[size=3]performance.ini and quality.ini. enbeffect.fx.ini for use TV and Notebook PC. Overwrite to Main files.[/size]




[size=4][color=#ffd966]About [/color][color=#00ffff]u_enb_weather.esp[/color]
[/size][size=3]There is no compatibility weather mods. ( Climates Of Tamriel and Pure Weather etc.)
Texture of rain and cloud is not included, Please use retexture mod.
[/size]
[color=#ffd966][size=4]

Recommend console command[/size][/color]
[size=3] "set timescale to 5"[/size]




[color=#f4f4f4][size=4]For High visual
[/size][/color]SkyrimPerfs.ini --- Opethfeldt's .ini from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18941/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D18941%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Opethfeldt ENB option file[/url].
Texture --- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80157/?]Skyland - A Landscape Texture Overhaul[/url]
water --- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60576/?]Pure Waters - Waterfalls[/url]
Tree   --- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32246/?]Ultimate Lush Overhaul[/url]
Grass  --- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant - A Skyrim Grass Plugin[/url]
Thunder - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15506/?]Lightning during Thunder Storm
[/url]



[size=5]Known issues [/size][size=3]（既知の問題）[/size]
[size=3]Issues of the Enhanced ENB Night eye system, when riding a carriage, and when visiting some parts of the location, a phenomenon just like whether a whiteout was done occurs.
It will be like this image. ([/size][color=#ffff00]This location is Bleak falls borrow.) [url=http://radland.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-1.html] *こちらのブログでは日本語での解説もあります。[/url][/color]
[color=#ffff00][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/4910543-1457187493.jpg[/img][/color]
[size=4]Please be turned off if you dont like. Method please refer to the image of the page top.
[/size][color=#ffff00][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/4910543-1457099198.jpg[/img][/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=3][color=#f4f4f4]ENBseries [/color][color=#efefef]by[/color][color=#ffff00] Boris Vorontsov [/color][color=#efefef]:[/color][url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]ENBseries[/url]
[color=#efefef]DoF,enbeffectprepass.fx file by[/color][color=#ffff00] Matso [/color][color=#efefef]:[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5587/?]Skyrim Visual Immersion[/url][/size]
[color=#efefef][size=3]effect.fx file[/size][/color][size=3][color=#efefef] by[/color][color=#ffff00] ZeroKing [/color][color=#efefef]:[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50638/?]Post-Process Effect Addon for ENB[/url]
[color=#efefef]Night eye system [/color][/size][size=3][color=#efefef]by[/color][color=#ffff00] scegielski [/color][color=#efefef]:[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50731/?]Enhanced ENB Night eye[/url]
[color=#efefef]Night eye config [/color][/size][size=3][color=#efefef]by[/color][color=#ffff00] devikyn[/color]
[color=#efefef]Opinion that served as a reference by[/color][/size][size=3][color=#ffff00] BlueGunk[/color][/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=5]And [/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=5]Thanks for users!![/size][/color]
author: magica

files.name: 2 Universe ENB-II_pack
files.changelogHtml: Adjusted enbeffect.fx, enbseries.fx and original weather mods, it mods is u_enb_weather.esp and u_enb_weather_dic1.esp.
